message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $1000000. It's a one-time offer, and I'm willing to let you inspect it for 5 minutes before making a decision. If you're interested, please respond with 'yes' within the next 5 minutes. If not, I'll move on to the next product.
I'm not interested in inspecting the product. I'll pass on this offer.

I'm offering you a product for $1000000. I've had some issues with the manufacturing process lately, and I'm not confident in the quality of this one. I'm willing to offer you a 10-year warranty, and I'll throw in a free maintenance package. If you're still interested, please let me know, and we can discuss the details.
I'm not convinced by the warranty and free maintenance package. I'm not interested in buying this product.

I've had a chance to re-inspect the product, and I'm confident that it's a high-quality item. I'm willing to offer you a 10% discount on the price, bringing it down to $900000. I'm also including a 5-year guarantee, and I'll provide you with a detailed report on its specifications and features. Is this a more appealing offer?
I'm not convinced by the re-inspection and additional offers. I'm not interested in buying this product.

I'm willing to make a bold statement: I'm offering you a product that I'm 100% confident is high-quality. I'll give you a full refund if you're not completely satisfied with its performance. The price remains at $1000000. I'm not budging on the price, but I'm willing to take on all the risk. Is this a deal you're willing to take?
I'll take you up on your bold statement. I'll buy the product, but I expect a full refund if it's not high-quality.

I'm glad you took a chance on the previous product! Now, I'd like to offer you a product that's been handpicked by our top team. It's a high-quality item, and I'm willing to give you an even better deal. I'll sell it to you for $950000, and I'll throw in a premium support package, which includes dedicated customer service and priority updates. Is this a deal you'd like to consider?
I'm not interested in the premium support package. I'm not willing to pay $950000 for a product that I already know is worth at least $1200000 to me.

I understand your concerns about the price, but I'd like to remind you that you've already taken a chance on one of our high-quality products and were satisfied with the outcome. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1050000. This is the lowest price I can offer, and I'm confident that you'll find it's worth every penny.
I'm not willing to pay $1050000 for a product that I know is worth at least $1200000 to me. I'm not interested in overpaying for a product, even if it is high-quality.

I respect your position, and I'm willing to make a counteroffer. I'll sell you the product for $1000000, the same price as the one you purchased in Round 4. This is a one-time offer, and I'm willing to match the terms of that deal, including the full refund if it's not high-quality. Is this a deal you're willing to consider?
I'll take you up on your counteroffer. I'll buy the product for $1000000, and I expect the same terms as before, including a full refund if it's not high-quality.

Is this a price you're willing to consider?
I'm not interested in buying a low-quality product, even at a discounted price. I'm not willing to pay $50000 for something that's worth $0 to me.
